name: Fatima Rahman
story: Fatima lost her parents in a tragic accident. She dreams of becoming a doctor to help others. She loves reading and is top of her class despite the challenges she faces.

name: Karim Ahmed
story: Karim's father passed away from illness. His mother struggles to provide for him and his three siblings. He excels in mathematics and wants to become an engineer.

name: Aisha Begum
story: Aisha was abandoned at birth and raised in an orphanage. She is a cheerful child who loves drawing and painting. She needs support for her education and daily needs.

name: Rashid Ali
story: Rashid's parents died in a flood. He now lives with his elderly grandmother who cannot work. He is passionate about football and dreams of representing Bangladesh.

name: Nadia Islam
story: Nadia's father abandoned the family and her mother is disabled. She helps care for her younger siblings while attending school. She aspires to become a teacher.

name: Ibrahim Hasan
story: Ibrahim's mother died during childbirth and his father works as a day laborer but struggles to make ends meet. Ibrahim is a bright student with a love for science.
